id: The Great British Bake Off 2018 winner: Rahul Mandal takes the top prize
paragraph:
The ninth series of the nation’s favourite baking contest – and the second in its new home of Channel 4 – climaxed with doughnut drama, al fresco flapping and a showstopper so tense, it shattered glass. Here are all the talking points from the 2018 grand final…“Please, please, please don’t do that to me,” Rahul Mandal begged of his misbehaving piping bag, before it burst and covered our hapless hero in mango creme patissiere. Oh dear.
